response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $7,500. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you.", "product_price": 7500}
